# Images Directory

## Required Assets

### Logo
Save the Stumpmasters Jax logo as `logo.png` in this directory.
- The logo should be the one with the gopher wearing sunglasses and American flag bandana
- Background: black
- Text: yellow "STUMPMASTERS" with white "JAX"

### Additional Images (placeholders for now)
- Before/after stump removal photos
- Equipment photos
- Team photos
- Service area photos

These will be added to the gallery and used throughout the site.
